on_confirm.buyerGpsErr: fulfillments[0].end.location gps is not matching with gps in /select
on_confirm.gpsErr: fulfillments[0].end.location.address.area_code is not matching with area_code in /select

on_status_pending.txnId: Transaction Id should be same from /select onwards

on_status_picked.invalid_message_id: Message_id cannot be same for on_status.pending and on_status.picked
on_status_picked.txnId: Transaction Id should be same from /select onwards
on_status_picked.updatedAt: order/updated_at timestamp can't be less than the pickup time

on_status_delivered.invalid_message_id: Message_id cannot be same for on_status.delivered and on_status.picked and on_status.pending
on_status_delivered.txnId: Transaction Id should be same from /select onwards
on_status_delivered.delPickTime: delivery timestamp (/end/time/timestamp) can't be less than or equal to the pickup timestamp (start/time/timestamp)
on_status_delivered.updatedAt: order/updated_at timestamp can't be less than the delivery time
